meanings.definition: A cooperative is an organization owned and operated by its members for their mutual benefit.
meanings.sent1: The local cooperative helps farmers sell their produce.
meanings.sent2: Many farmers joined the cooperative to improve their bargaining power.
meanings.sent3: The cooperative meeting turned into a lively discussion about pricing.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, cooperatives are like a team of allies working together.
meanings.sent5: Joining the cooperative felt like becoming part of a big family.

meanings.definition: Cooperatives are businesses that are owned and run by the people who work for them.
meanings.sent1: Employees at the cooperative share the profits equally.
meanings.sent2: The cooperative members vote on important decisions together.
meanings.sent3: At the cooperative picnic, everyone brought delicious homemade dishes.
meanings.sent4: The concept of cooperatives is a shining example of unity in diversity.
meanings.sent5: Working at the cooperative gives a sense of belonging and responsibility.
